phrases: The appearance of defectors aboard the Macross
has raised the possibility of coexistence with the Zentradi.
Seeing a glimmer of hope, Misa resolves to travel to Earth
to persuade those at UN High Command.
You think you will be able to convince them looking like that?
Did you tell Lieutenant Ichijo that you are going to Earth?
The shuttle is ready for launch.
It is scheduled to depart in fifteen minutes.
No movement detected from point A-4 onward, sir.
I just hope they do not launch another attack.
There is someone here who is even more restless.
Prepare to begin your landing sequence!
Excuse me, but please do not talk to me while I am giving orders!
She even forgot to say, No smoking on the bridge!
Escort squadron, prepare to launch in three minutes.
Captain Hayase's stand-in is Shammy, huh?
The rumor is she is kind of a screw-up.
I guess I am going now.
Can it connect to the ship's internal phone line?
Yes, if you do not mind voice-only.
Um, I have got the day off, you know.
I just wanted to say goodbye.
I am about to leave for Earth.
I am taking all the data we have acquired to try to persuade High Command
to end the war with the Zentradi.
No one told me about this!
If it got out that I was heading back to Earth,
it could cause unrest among the civilians on board.
Soldiers using special authority to return to Earth.
That is how they would see it.
So this had to be top-secret.
Captain, where are you right now?!
Once I go back, I may not be able to return to the Macross.
That is why I wanted to at least say goodbye to you.
Captain, where are you calling from?!
Lt. Ichijo, please look after our Zentradi defectors.
There are still a lot of people who do not understand them.
Shuttle escort squadron is now launching.
An enemy detachment has suddenly moved into action!
It looks like they have detected the shuttle!
Enemy fighters are approaching from 1 of the clock!
Units 4, 5, and 6, break off and delay the enemy!
An enemy formation has altered course!
Enemy pods have appeared at 2 of the clock high.
They are closing on the shuttle, fast!
Units 5 and 6, head to point Lambda 0-3-4 and rejoin the main shuttle group!
Reinforcements for the escort squadron are en route!
How long until those reinforcements get there?
At maximum thrust, twenty minutes, sir.
The mechanics will know what it means.
And have Lieutenant Ichijo pilot it!
At this rate, I am not going to make it!
First Lieutenant Ichijo, your target is point Lambda 0-3-2!
I have never heard of that location!
Did not you tell him the new codes?
Well, I never thought he would have to sortie on his day off, so...
Lieutenant Ichijo, I will use the old code system.
Please head to point A3-102 immediately!
Finally, that is thirty down, huh?
The enemy pods have been destroyed.
Lt. Ichijo is staying behind to escort the shuttle.
I have just about had enough of standing in for Captain Hayase!
Well, you certainly appear to have recovered from your little code mistake.
It was a good lesson for Shammy to learn.
Why do not we give her a break this time?
You have an incoming transmission from First Lieutenant Ichijo.
It looks like you got hit pretty hard.
You said before that you might not come back to the Macross.
I am a living witness, someone who knows the truth about the Zentradi.
High Command may not let me go so quickly.
Even though your father's an admiral in the UN Forces?
I do not want any special treatment just because of who my father is.
I should be thanking you instead.
This whole time, you have helped us all so much.
I know all I have done is complain about you,
but you are a great controller.
We are about to begin reentry.
I hope... you complete... your mission...
and can... safely... return... to the... Macross.
Admiral, are you ready to greet the shuttle?
I will be awaiting you at Elevator 4.
The shuttle is twenty minutes behind schedule.
Would you care to return to the control tower?
You would think he was at a wake.
First Lieutenant Ichijo, it is too soon to start getting depressed.
I am sure Captain Hayase will make it back.
I am not thinking about the captain.
And I am not depressed either!
Anyway, at times like this, it is best to go someplace fun.
At least with you, I will have a decent opponent.
I do not think I could beat you today.
So we will find you a one-player game.
By order of Captain Bruno J. Global, I stand ready with my report, sir!
Boss, machines 16 and 7 are about to get cleaned out!
I never shoulda opened an arcade on the Macross!
So we and the Zentradi have almost identical genetic makeup.
If this report is true, we may have to change our attitude toward the enemy.
Then you will persuade the military to enter into peaceful negotiations?
With a little practice, I am sure you will be able to do better, sir.
Could I try a game against you?
It looks like you have just about cleaned out your machine too.
Can we start at Level B?
Looks like a good match is going down!
Boss, I am going to put machine 7's game up.
the Macross has an ace pilot of its own!
Could this man be the one?
She is the type to keep'them wrapped up, though.
This game has been my way of life, but I lost!
Wow, leave it to the genius pilot!
She had me sweating for a while there.
Could I get your name and phone number?
Would you meet me in Happiness Forest Park tomorrow night at 9:00?
That is a real beauty you got a date with!
They have begun considering how to open peace negotiations.
You have been staring at me for a while now.
I was just thinking how much you look like your late mother.
So, is there a man in your life yet?
Anyway, what is it you wanted to show me?
Once we have used the Grand Cannon, our negotiations will proceed smoothly.
This can instantly destroy a fleet of tens of thousands of ships.
When the Zentradi see its power, they will have no choice but to begin negotiations.
Compared to a Zentradi carrier, the Grand Cannon is not even a child's toy!
This weapon will only make the war worse!
It will not serve any purpose!
I am sure the Zentradi will negotiate without us having to use this.
So now a born soldier like you is going to start talking so idealistically?
Do you think the ones who attacked your shuttle are interested in your peace?
Their blood and genes may be the same as ours, but they are still aliens.
Reaching an understanding with them will not be easy.
Misa, how many thousands of years did humans fight among themselves
before the formation of the Earth UN Government?
The day has been set for the firing of the Grand Cannon.
So, is it true you have not left his side for over a week, Miss Minmay?
There are rumors the two of you are going to get married.
We have not even considered that!
Miss Minmay, what about your old boyfriend?
You are good at feigning ignorance!
Would you know who I mean if I mention a certain First Lieutenant?
He is just a good friend!
Anyway, you and Kaifun have been rather close.
It is strange that you have never considered marriage.
Loli, sir, what is this marriage?
They do things even more amazing than kissing!
Kaifun, you really have not proposed to her?
Quit hiding the truth and fess up!
We are not getting married, however...
Personally, I would not be adverse to the idea.
Does this tie look good on me?
I was thinking of wearing it on my date tomorrow!
He is just a good friend!
So, what are you doing brooding in a place like this?
You have already got someone who is a better match for you than that girl.
I do not have anyone like that!
Could not it be that you just have not noticed yet?
Lots of times, people do not see what is too close to them.
They can get into selfish fights with each other,
but deep in their hearts it is a different story.
That is how it was with Roy and me.
You do not find someone like that very often.
That is all I wanted to say to you.
And if you spend all your time here, you will catch a cold.
Max and Milia move closer to their third battle.
Milia appears before Max at the appointed place and pulls out a dagger.
there is burning hatred for an enemy that has already defeated her twice.
To awaken us, the young mankind
And fight to protect their loved ones
Will set out on their journey
Slicing through the darkness they fly toward
That blue planet that shines in the distance
I will not follow it anymore
The shadow you cast as you run away
We all keep running to the end
But we still cannot see the goal
Even now, I keep running toward
The light that shines so far away
